EmailTemplate.description: Confirm approval for a pickup request on multiple related requested services (E/R, DNR, XPU)
EmailTemplate.name: Customer or Internal: Pickup Approval - Multi Case Escalation
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Request Approval Needed: {!Case.Case_Type__c}- {!Case.Case_Subtype_Email_Format__c} - {!Case.Location_Code__c} - Ref. #: {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
